reviews.review: Epic adventure!

8年前、初めて3D酔いを体験して惜しくも手放したゲームに再挑戦。
現代に於いてさすがにもう大丈夫かと思っていましたが、
ボディ ブローのように効いて、ハッと気がついたら気持ち悪くなって終了。

2013年も完敗です。
ゴードン、また会いましょう！

what idiot designer makes an entire game a chase scene!?

Half-Life 2. If you havent got this game and like FPS then what the hell is wrong with you? This game is old now it released in 2004. I did my first playthrough of the entire Half-Life series this year so the experience is still fresh in my mind. The game follows a linear path yet has very open areas making the linear nature of the game seem less apparent. The gun play in this game is lacking by todays standards the guns sounds are sub par but this is just me nit picking. The story line for the game is incredible most of the story is told through the enviroment while the basic plot is told through the people that Gordon meets along his journey. The game is relativly long for an FPS it took me about 12 hours to beat the first time. I recomend playing this game multiple times though to fully grasp the story to help contribute to the massive story speculation of Half Life 3.You really have to play this game series before you die then only then will you understand how painful the wait is for Half-Life 3. 9/10

[i]Гордон Фримен умер в Чернобыльской зоне отчуждения в 2012м - приятной игры![/i]
Ну, а если моё заявление вас задело и вы решили все же прочитать спойлер - вот вам подробоные доказательства.[spoiler]После событий Half-Life 2 Episode 2, G-man переносит Фримена [i](Как во времени, так и территориально, а на сколько вы знаете телепортация и временной контроль доступны G-Man'у)[/i] в Чернобыльскую зону отчуждения. Намерения G-Man'a по этому поводу остаются не ясными. Возможно, так он наказал Фримана за то, что тот не убёрег Илая Венса от гибели. Фримен долго скитаясь по зоне и не зная, что делать в конечном счете обменял свою любимую монтировку на консервы, дабы не умереть от голода. Но от гибели это его не спасло. Умер Фримен при не выесненных обстоятельствах на Дикой территории в S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Shadow of Chernobyl, в подземном переходе. Вот так сплелись во едино сюжеты разных вселенных Half-Life и S.T.A.L.K.E.R. и вот отличии от второго, у Half-Life никогда не будет продолжения, потому что Гордон Фриман мёртв![/spoiler]

What else can I say that hasn't already been said about Half-Life 2? The fine folks over at Valve have succeeded in creating not only one of the most immersive experiences a game can offer, but one of the greatest games of all time.  For those who aren't even fans of the first-person shooters, I still encourage you to look into this game. Should you choose to don the HEV suit and take on the role of the crowbar-weilding, badass physicist Dr. Gordon Freeman, I can guarentee you'll be in for the train ride of your life.  I could go on and on about how stellar this game is, but your time would be better spent playing it for yourself.
This game is awesome!
Gutes Spiel.

Rise and shine, Mr. Freeman. Rise and shine. Not that I wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest. And all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until... well, let's just say your hour has come again. The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world. So, wake up, Mr. Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes. ―HλLF-LIFE

Half-Life 2. I never finished it. No, I'm not ashamed of it. I think Half-Life is overrated, I really do. Yes, the storytelling is great, but the gameplay is just so bland. Not just now, but even back when it was first released. I do enjoy physics puzzles from time to time, but HL2 has nothing else but physics puzzles. For a FPS that's supposed to be revolutionary it didn't really impress me, Also, because it's one of those few games that still, after all those years, manages to give me motion sickness, making it virtually impossible for me to complete.

[Rating: 72/100]

Let me just get something straight with you, I do not hate this game, but i do not love it either. I just think this game is too overrated.

Pros: Amazing physics engine, top notch sounds and voice acting, realistic A.I, for a old game it has AMAZING graphics, a wide variety of guns, good story.

Cons: Gordon Freeman is one of the most blank character ever, he could have so much potencial with the rich characters in the game, repetitive gameplay.

Over-all: 8.0/10. A good game, could have been better if it had Co-op multiplayer. However there are Co-op mods in steam, one of them beeing ''Synergy''.

So, go buy it, and pray to Gabe Newell he makes a Ep.3 or HL3.

LE FPS ! 

Aller retourner dans vos foutue FPS commerciale tel que les Call Of Duty si vous ne connaisser pas ce jeux et son prédecésseurs !

La mytique saga qui a réveler le FPS ( Attention pas inventée je sais que Doom et Wolfstein était la avant lui ! ) L'incontournable de cher Valve !

Pour ce qui ne le savent pas Half - Life 2 est le PREMIER jeu a avoirs put être MODer alors aller chercher tout les mod / map / pack / suite en plus parce - que c'est pour moi LE MEILLEURS FPS DE TOUT LES TEMPS !

Je tiens a précsiser que je prends le jeu dans son contexte a l'époque !

Graphisme : 19 / 20 ( Inégaler jusqu'en 2008 alors qu'il est sortie en 2006 )

Son et musique : 18 / 20 ( Qui n'a pas eu peur dans un métro abandonné où des hordes de zombies et de headcrab s'approche de vous dessus couplé a une musique stressante ! )

Scénario : 20 / 20 ( Totalement immersife dans son genre de par son univers unique et les personnages qui sont juste ultra charismatiques ! )

A connaitre ou a avoirs !

This game is the 2nd best source game behind Garry's Mod.
It has an extremely gripping storyline, it is worth every penny. There is also a multiplayer version called Synergy which is a very fun game to play with friends.
Amazing Game. try it out

Игра всех времён и народов! Однозначно, без базара. Идеал игростроения. Совершенство симбиоза геймплея и сюжета. Может казаться, что надо быть поехавшим чтобы игру, рассчитанную на 12-13 часов прохождения, играть вот уже 10 год подряд оставляя за собой море времени, тысячи часов прохождения первой части, различных дополнений официальных и не только, 2-ой части, эпизодов и т.д. - но это единственная игра, которая уводит тебя под саунды Келли Бэйли в мир Half-Life, в мир где "он — словно озарение, после него понимаешь, какой гадостью тебя кормили последние годы". Мир, который как бриллиант, который навсегда. Который при каждом новом запуске оного открывается по разному. Закончу цитатой известного издательства: "Если вы видели Half-Life 2, то считайте, что видели лучшую компьютерную игру на этой планете". О да! О да!! ДА! ДА!
One of the best story lines I have ever played. And its a long series!

"Wins more than 50 game-of-the-year awards on its way to being named "Best PC Game Ever" by PC Gamer, and launches a franchise with more than eight million retail units sold worldwide.

The player again picks up the crowbar of research scientist Gordon Freeman, who finds himself on an alien-infested Earth being picked to the bone, its resources depleted, its populace dwindling. Freeman is thrust into the unenviable role of rescuing the world from the wrong he unleashed back at Black Mesa. And a lot of people he cares about are counting on him."

If you played Half-Life 1, and liked it, its a continue game from Valve.I recommend you to play this game.
